channel.description: Welcome to the Russell Feldhausen Pronouns: he/him (785) 292-3121 (Call/Text) 2213 Engineering Hall (working remotely) russfeld AT ksu DOT edu https://russfeld.me - @russfeld Other Instructors & TAs Nathan Bean Please use email cc410-help cc410-help@KSUemailProd.onmicrosoft.com for all course communication Image Credit: Codio Course Structure ~12-15 Modules per Course Tutorial, Quiz, Example, Project Gated - Must Complete in Order ~1 Module Each Week Work Around your Schedule Manual Grading & Feedback Module 0 - Introduction Navigating Canvas & Codio Syllabus Where to Get Help Plagiarism Extra Credit Course Readiness Quiz Syllabus Contract Between Teacher & Student Read Carefully Ask Questions Diversity Statement Netiquette Subject to Change Late Work Each Module has a Due Date Complete ALL Work in Module Penalty = 10% Per Day Late Still Must Complete Module Don't Get Behind!
